displayProperties.description:
Unlocks focusing of Echo Engrams into the following Echo gear once added to your collection:
Weapons:
• Aberrant Action
• Corrasion

Inserted comment: Greetings, Captain! There should no longer be ANY chance of engram deletion!
displayProperties.name: Secondary Engram Focusing

displayProperties.description: An empty research bay where Failsafe can store specimens.
displayProperties.name: Premium Research Bay

displayProperties.description: A viable research specimen has been detected. Failsafe will guide you to it with her proximity sensors.
displayProperties.name: Proximity Sensor Alert

displayProperties.description: A research specimen found on Nessus. Complete the research quest to provide Failsafe with enough data to identify it.
displayProperties.name: Specimen ID: NES006

displayProperties.description: NES006: A Minotaur's weapon lost to the trials of combat.
displayProperties.name: Assimilated Torch Hammer

displayProperties.description:
Unlocks additional engrams when opening Echo Chests.

- Inserted comment: The same way the Vex used this tech to deformat matter, I'll use it to reformat engram data in the field.
displayProperties.name: Data Format Cipher

displayProperties.description:
Detects the presence of high-value targets in Echoes Battlegrounds. Defeat the high-value targets for bonus rewards.

- Inserted comment: Protocol overrides broadcasting, Captain. Mind the lasers!
displayProperties.name: Combat Protocol Override

displayProperties.description: Upgrades unlocked by completing Specimen Research quests with Failsafe.
displayProperties.name: Progress Failsafe's Research Quests for more fabrications.

displayProperties.description: A piece of Golden Age technology manufactured to augment or retrofit older pieces of tech. This module fits a wide variety of Golden Age AI and computer systems, upgrading their functionality and processing capability.
displayProperties.name: Golden Age Tech Module

displayProperties.description: Retrieve specimens from Nessus to analyze with Failsafe's Biomechanical Research AI Node (B.R.A.I.N.).
displayProperties.name: Research Bays

displayProperties.description: Failsafe has compiled a specimen research report for you.
displayProperties.name: Specimen Research Report

displayProperties.description:
• Echo Chests containing Seasonal gear and Echo Engrams appear at the end of Episode: Echoes activities. 

• Use Echo Engrams at Failsafe in the H.E.L.M. to receive specific Episode: Echoes gear and weapons.
displayProperties.name: EPISODE: ECHOES INFORMATION

displayProperties.description: Failsafe is not yet capable of deciphering this engram.
displayProperties.name: Incomplete Data

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.
displayProperties.name: Classified

displayProperties.description:
An engram containing Episode: Echoes weapons.

The weapon received is guaranteed to have Deepsight Resonance.
displayProperties.name: Echo Weapon Engram (Deepsight)

displayProperties.description:
A special tool used for collecting and storing Radiolite samples. Allows you to collect these types of Radiolite samples from Episode: Echoes activities:

• Iridescent
• Ivory
• Crimson

Due to Iridescent Radiolite's unstable nature, it has a tendency to denature into simpler forms of Radiolite during the sampling process.

Storage capacity: {var:2152577323}g
displayProperties.name: Standard Radiolite Sampler

displayProperties.description:
An improved version of the sampling tool, courtesy of Failsafe's research. Allows you to collect these types of Radiolite from Episode: Echoes activities:

• Iridescent
• Ivory
• Crimson
• Golden
• Azure

Due to Iridescent Radiolite's unstable nature, it has a tendency to denature into simpler forms of Radiolite during the sampling process.

Storage capacity: {var:2152577323}g
displayProperties.name: Tuned Radiolite Sampler

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Acquiring this sampler adds {var:123643240}g to your storage capacity.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.
displayProperties.name: Classified

displayProperties.description:
Automatically redeemed when opening chests in Seasonal activities, unlocking bonus rewards.

Echo Keys can be found by completing activities throughout the system.
displayProperties.name: Echo Key

displayProperties.description: A signal beacon was dropped from one of the high-value targets in the Echoes Battlegrounds. It appears to emit a powerful signal, which matches readings reported to originate from somewhere in Watcher's Grave on Nessus.
displayProperties.name: Assimilated Beacon

displayProperties.description:
A specially crafted hammer capable of activating one of the Planetary Pistons on Nessus. Watch your toes.

The hammer will regenerate charges as you complete Echo activities throughout the system. If totally exhausted, it will regenerate one charge daily.
displayProperties.name: Planetary Piston Hammer

displayProperties.description:
Grants access to this week's Trials of Osiris tournament. Teams of three compete and earn reputation based on the number of rounds won on the passage. 

Each victory at seven match wins grants significantly improved rewards.

Each match completed with a full fireteam grants a bonus chance for additional rewards.
displayProperties.name: Passage of Mercy

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Purchasing another Trials Passage will reset your Trials Passage for all characters on this account.

displayProperties.description: Increases Tripmine Grenade duration and blast radius. Gain Tripmine Grenade energy from ability final blows.
displayProperties.name: Wish-Dragon Teeth

displayProperties.description: Increases Sidearm airborne effectiveness, ready speed, and reload speed. While you're critically wounded, swapping to a Sidearm reloads it and increases its damage. While this effect is active, Sidearm final blows reload the weapon and extend the effect's duration.
displayProperties.name: Spring-Loaded Mounting

displayProperties.description: Quick successive attacks with Arc Staff increase its damage output and duration.
displayProperties.name: Synapse Junctions

displayProperties.description: Increases the chaining capabilities of Arcbolt Grenades. Damaging enemies with Jolt lightning strikes and collecting Ionic Traces both grant additional Arcbolt Grenade energy. Arcbolt Grenades stun  [Disruption] Overload Champions and delay their health regeneration.
displayProperties.name: Probability Matrix

displayProperties.description: Dodging reloads all weapons and increases both movement and weapon handling speeds for a brief time.
displayProperties.name: Wraithmetal Mail

displayProperties.description: Provides radar while you're aiming. Enhances your radar resolution while crouched. Visually marks targets. Deals more damage to low-health marked targets. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.
displayProperties.name: Upgraded Sensor Pack

displayProperties.description: Precision final blows reduce the cooldown of your Super. Modifies Golden Gun to fire a single, high-damage shot. Targets defeated by that shot give you Super energy and explode.
displayProperties.name: Hawkeye Hack

displayProperties.description: Damaging a powerful combatant or Guardian with an ability temporarily increases weapon damage of the same type. Defeating that marked target with damage that matches the element creates an elemental pickup.
displayProperties.name: Relentless Tracker

displayProperties.description: When you ready a fully loaded Hand Cannon that deals Kinetic damage or a damage type that matches your equipped Super, each hit from that Hand Cannon increases the damage of the next shot for a short time against a target. Hand Cannons ready faster and are more accurate immediately after swapping to them. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Hand Cannons while the buff is active.
displayProperties.name: Illegally Modded Holster

displayProperties.description: Provides ability energy for each target tethered by Deadfall anchors. Moebius Quiver has an additional shot.
displayProperties.name: Uncanny Arrows

displayProperties.description: Increases sprint speed and slide distance, and improves High Jump, Strafe Jump, and Triple Jump. Take less damage from targets when airborne.
displayProperties.name: Hydraulic Boosters

displayProperties.description: Melee hits grant Armor Charge, and you take less melee damage while you have Armor Charge. Taking melee damage causes you to emit a burst of damaging Arc energy that Jolts targets, consuming your Armor Charge and dealing more damage based on the number of stacks consumed.
displayProperties.name: Fury Conductors

displayProperties.description:
Defeating targets with Void damage has a chance to grant an escalating bonus to damage with Void weapons. Defeating targets with Void melee grants Super energy.

While Sentinel Shield is active, defeating targets with melee attacks recharges Shield Throw, which extends your Super on hitting a target.
displayProperties.name: Horns of Doom

displayProperties.description: When you're surrounded, gain increased melee and Super damage, as well as improved weapon handling and reload speed.
displayProperties.name: Biotic Enhancements

displayProperties.description: Generates an additional Orb of Power from Supers and a healing pulse when Barricade is activated.
displayProperties.name: Survival Well

displayProperties.description: Steadily reloads a portion of your equipped Auto Rifle's or Machine Gun's magazine from reserves. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Auto Rifles and Machine Guns.
displayProperties.name: Auto-Loading Link

displayProperties.description: Solar final blows while standing in a Sunspot create a Sunspot. Greatly improves recharge rate of your melee and grenade while your Solar Super is charged. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.
displayProperties.name: Sunfire Furnace

displayProperties.description: Kills with Arc melee abilities trigger health regeneration and restore melee energy.
displayProperties.name: Transfusion Matrix

displayProperties.description: Grants ability energy when you're damaged. When critically wounded, regain maximum health on kills.
displayProperties.name: Dreaded Visage

displayProperties.description: Provides additional aerial maneuverability and enables accurate hipfire while you're in the air during Lift. Provides a large benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons while hipfiring.
displayProperties.name: Jump Jets

displayProperties.description: Reloads stowed Submachine Guns and allows you to ready them instantly. Improves your handling with Submachine Guns and your movement while wielding one. Provides a moderate benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of Submachine Guns.
displayProperties.name: Mecha Holster

displayProperties.description: Increases sprint speed. Sprinting builds up a static charge. After melee-attacking an enemy, that charge will chain damage to nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Linear Actuators

displayProperties.description: Increases the duration of Solar Grenades. Solar melee kills grant unlimited Solar Grenade energy for a brief time.
displayProperties.name: Helium Spirals

displayProperties.description: Melee and finisher final blows instantly grant cure and provide restoration for a short duration.
displayProperties.name: Vampire's Caress

displayProperties.description: Defeating targets with melee attacks increases your melee damage. Targets frozen by Penumbral Blast automatically shatter.
displayProperties.name: Warlord's Sigil

displayProperties.description: Fusion Grenades have an additional charge and recharge from empowered weapon damage, with empowered weapon final blows granting more energy. Defeating targets with Fusion Grenades grant Rift energy.
displayProperties.name: Fusion Harness

displayProperties.description: While you have a Solar super equipped, aiming weapons while you're midair suspends you there for a short time, reducing incoming flinch and granting damage resistance. Weapon hits extend this effect's duration, and weapon final blows reload your Solar weapons from reserves. Provides a large benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.
displayProperties.name: Tome of Dawn

displayProperties.description: Provides additional damage resistance during Nova Bomb. Nova Bomb kills grant Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Actual Grandeur

displayProperties.description: Arc ability or jolt final blows increase the recharge rate of your Arc abilities and extend the duration of Stormtrance.
displayProperties.name: Conduction Tines

displayProperties.description: Highlights priority targets and improves the regeneration speed of your grenade, melee, and Rift abilities. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.
displayProperties.name: Cerebral Uplink

displayProperties.description: Void-damage kills increase ability energy recharge rate.
displayProperties.name: Abyssal Extractors

displayProperties.description: Sprint speed increased. After a short time sprinting, your currently equipped weapon is automatically reloaded.
displayProperties.name: Strange Protractor

displayProperties.description: Your Rifts gain the additional ability to increase weapon reload speeds. Empowering Rift makes weapons effective over longer ranges.
displayProperties.name: Alchemical Etchings

displayProperties.description: Increased resilience.
displayProperties.name: Plasteel Reinforcement Mod

displayProperties.description: Increased mobility.
displayProperties.name: Mobility Enhancement Mod

displayProperties.description: Increased health recovery.
displayProperties.name: Restorative Mod

displayProperties.description: No mod currently selected.
displayProperties.name: Empty Mod Socket

displayProperties.description: Keep it moving. Swift of foot and long of stride.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Boots

displayProperties.name: Scout Report: EDZ

displayProperties.description: The latest scout report. Contains Nessus cache locations.
displayProperties.name: Scout Report: Nessus

displayProperties.description: Use this item to gain experience at a faster rate.
displayProperties.name: XP Boost

displayProperties.description: This item serves no purpose and can be dismantled into Bright Dust.
displayProperties.name: Fizzled Fireteam Medallion

displayProperties.description: Select a piece of Rare gear to consume. That item will be used to infuse another item with power.
displayProperties.name: Rare Infusion

displayProperties.name: Legendary Infusion

displayProperties.description: Select a piece of Exotic gear to consume. That item will be used to infuse another item with power.
displayProperties.name: Exotic Infusion

displayProperties.description: The currency of the City. A form of programmable matter, used both for craft and as a fuel.
displayProperties.name: Glimmer

displayProperties.description: Rare Reef coins struck during the height of the Golden Age. Of great value to certain collectors.
displayProperties.name: Silver

displayProperties.description: Remnants of powerful items. Used to improve gear or trade for other items.
displayProperties.name: Legendary Shards

displayProperties.description: Remnants of finely crafted items. Used to purchase new items from certain vendors.
displayProperties.name: Bright Dust

displayProperties.description: Required for purchasing Upgrade Modules and forging Masterwork gear. Chance to obtain from Legendary gear, some activities, and bounties, or purchasable from the Cryptarch in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: Enhancement Core

displayProperties.description: This item serves no purpose and can be safely dismantled.
displayProperties.name: Mod Components

displayProperties.description: Transmat system components obtained from dismantling Legendary-quality transmat effects. A shipwright can use these to create new transmat effects.
